pageHeader.titleMain: UI Development for Ouya Game Console
pageHeader.subtitle: Prototyping of the animation and user interaction for the Ouya Game Console.
pageHeader.description: >- Working from design team sketches, I created a working prototype of the console's user interface. This UI allowed users to browse games, videos, and other content using a game controller.

projectInfo.results: Presented at the Design designer(s) exhibition, part of the 'Lille World Design Capital 2020'.
